short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ever been stuck at the bottom of an infinite scrolling page? Simply right click and choose 'Scroll Up' or click on the popup.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: In a world of pages that infinitely load new content it seems that scrolling down never stops. We then get stuck scrolling up and up. So I made a simple script that can pop you back up to the top of the page. Press the Up Arrow button or right click on the page and click "Scroll up"
